short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Past Prices Paid on Amazon Products including Groceries

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides real-time historical shopping data (namely past prices paid for items) for Amazon (include Amazon Smile) products including GROCERIES which was the motivation for creating the extension.
